adv: The visualizations load quickly and are well organized and thought out. I am guessing that numeric variables on a large range could be binned automatically, but I am unsure of that - it could be these values were categorical in their nature.
disadv:
I am not able to select and filter records of interest
I did not see a way to change the glyph/item display
I am not able to change the zoom/perspective in order to change what I see (for example, I have to scroll to see the whole list of Directors)
The order of visualizations that I see and the combinations of the three dimensions cannot be determined by me (I have to click on Load more to see more)
